name: Sled Bandit
summary:
He is Bandit, Sled Bandit. Many have heard of this mysterious figure, but few have seen him. It has been said that he is the best snowmobiler ever. According to rumors, Sled Bandit is an outstanding snowmobile handler.
The villagers are rumored that Sled Bandit will make the longest jumps and the biggest flips. He climbs the steepest hills and performs longest wheelies in his snowmobile.
